name: John Sparks
text: Grew up with this franchise. Love it. Good atmosphere, friendly staff and amazing food. Plenty of tvs for any game and actual arcade games for all ages.

name: Nicole Johnson
text: This place is awesome! We ordered the Factory Special two different times and it was fantastic both times. The salad bar is good, too. The restaurant is clean and nice with games and a small play area for kids. The staff is extremely friendly. Well definitely be back!

name: Athina Greiner
text: Very long wait but it was a relaxing fun joint. It looks like it shut down? Drove passed it the other day windows are covered and locked. I really like the atmosphere though. Pizza was good. Didnt quite like the crust.Price was on par with other pizza places.

name: Melaney Dittler
text: Great spot for an all you can eat lunch!  Salad bar was great and the pizza is pretty darn good. Lunch also comes with soup and sodas.  Great family place.

name: Jazzmin Deras
text: Great service and amazing subs! I recommend the meatball. Just perfect good old fashioned pizza you get when you go to a parlor. Plus there‚Äôs beer & wine! They have an all you can eat lunch buffet too and a few TVs plus games for the kids or old school cabinet game fanatics! Find my high score of Tetris: JAZZ. üëåüèªüòÇ

name: Betty Anderson
text: Pretty good. Kind of chilly in the restaurant. Long wait for pizza with only one table before us. We had pizza with Olive oil and sun dried tomatoes. It was pretty tasty.

name: Mari P
text: Awesome experience here! We went for the lunch buffet and right away the employees were so nice and went out of their way to make sure we were taken care of. The pizza and garlic knots were awesome. Not to mention the salad bar and it ‚Ä¶More

name: Mike Z
text: Nice people, clean restaurant and some tasty food!  We got a large special pizza and a bunch of wings, everything was quite good!  Definitely going back.

name: Micah Berninghausen
text: I love this place! My son and I have been in for the lunch Buffet a hand full of times, and I‚Äôve ordered Togo and deliver. Always Great Pizzas!!! Awesome Staff, Thank you Pizza Factory! :)

name: Jay Bulotti
text: The wings were horrible, had better from the bag from a grocery store cooler. Pizza was super dry and tough with minimal flavor. Went there so the wife could try the cauliflower pizza crust and she could not eat it, too crispy and also dry. ‚Ä¶More

name: Karishma Sherpa
text: My niece is having her 4th Birthday Party this Saturday.  Very good pizza and more, I love going to the Pizza Factory.

name: Holly Browne
text: Super friendly staff, cool clean dine-in area with TVs and a small arcade, and the pizza is delicious. They don‚Äôt skimp on the toppings and you can tell that everything is made fresh

name: Richard Camara
text: Went in with my family at 7pm on a Monday night, a full 2 hours before they closed. The salad bar was completely shut down and looked at had been for sometime. When I asked if they would reopen the salad bar I got a, nah. Basically they ‚Ä¶More

name: Tiffani
text: I'm not a huge pizza fan.  When we go to pizza places, I'll usually have salad or wings while my husband has his standard pepperoni pizza.  Today was no different though it was our first visit to Pizza Factory.     I had half bbq wings & ‚Ä¶More

name: Keith Stokoe
text: Fantastic pizza, give it a shot! I ordered a small pizza, hot wings, and breadsticks. Everything was delicious. The food smelled great and you could tell this is a pizza place about the quality. Miles ahead of any big chains like Pizza Hut ‚Ä¶More

name: William Mathieson
text:
Ordered 2 personal pizzas, absolutely horrible. Worst crust ever.
Ordered 2 sandwiches, blah.. Nothing special at all. The Italian sausage sand is a patty not a link, dont ask me what the hell that's about, very odd. Maybe a ‚Ä¶More

name: Jackson Stone
text: It's a good place to get pizza and it has some fun arcade games

name: Rebecca Davis
text: Me and my kids absolutely love this pizza and their wings are great as well evidently it's been there for years I just found out about it two months ago and we've had it at least 10 times since excellent pizza excellent prices their wings are excellent I haven't tried the rest of the stuff on the menu but I sure will be

name: Chris Keith
text: With the open kitchen you can see the entire food preparation process, i.e. the dough tossing, the topping, the sandwich making, and you can see that these folks are doing it right.  The sauce, cheese, and toppings are well proportioned and ‚Ä¶More

name: Angela Faling
text: Good pizza and beer. Happy people.

name: Amanda nicole
text: I‚Äôve been wanting to try this place for awhile once I found they had dairy free options but I am disappointed. Could only get a medium size, hardly any toppings on it and paid the same price for a large somewhere else. whopping $26 for a ‚Ä¶More

name: Kat Maloney
text: Super excited to have one of these in the Portland area! Food is delicious and the servic2 at this location was fantastic!

name: Lesley Schelzke
text: Good food and nice staff

name: Daniel Stratton
text: How do I judge Pizza Factory? The remodel of the place is very nice, they did a good job. There were an excessive amount of flat screens all turned off Sunday at lunch... so they aren't there to show NFL games, so I am a bit confused what ‚Ä¶More

name: Loren Hovis
text: Great food a couple of penny's extra but worthy great people to serve u and a buffet setting Kool

name: Ali Durosimi
text: Nice service and professionalism of the workers.

name: Mohammed Qadri
text:
Very nasty pizza I ordered a cheese pizza it was horrible all burned up. It was like I was chewing on leather shoes or something. These people should be ambarassed for themselves.
Horrible Horrible Horrible pizza.

name: Gus Mavraganis
text: Came to check out the new neighborhood pizza place for my company. They don't sell slices. C ya...

name: Daniel Gurzhuy
text: The best pizza

name: Isabella Valderrama
text: Great place, sad it closed down!

name: J Onuliak
text: Delicious!!
